channel.title: Keith Ashfield
channel.description: Recent news about Keith Ashfield, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Sou'Wester
item.description:
Shea's back: PEI MP fisheries minister again
Over the past year she had filled again as fisheries minister when Keith Ashfield had to deal with health issues. Ashfield recently had resigned from the portfolio due to his health. Shea lost her second portfolio, however. Backbench New Brunswick MP Rob ...

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
Member of Parliament John Duncan Presents 2012 Small Craft Harbours Prix d ...
FANNY BAY, BRITISH COLUMBIA--(Marketwired - June 26, 2013) - The Honourable John Duncan, Member of Parliament for Vancouver Island North, on behalf of the Honourable Keith Ashfield, Minister of Fisheries and Oceans and Minister responsible for the Atlantic ... "The Fanny Bay Harbour Authority Board members are being awarded Fisheries and Oceans Canada's Small Craft Harbours Prix d'Excellence in recognition of their exemplary dedication to the ongoing success of their harbour," said MP Duncan.

item.title: Mentioned by Sun News Network
item.description:
Fisheries minister, ill with cancer, asks out of cabinet
OTTAWA - Fisheries Minister Keith Ashfield will step out of cabinet to fight a form of cancer, Hodgkin lymphona, the Fredericton MP told his constituents Friday. Prime Minister Stephen Harper is widely expected to complete a mid-term shuffle of his cabinet ...
